name: Notion Cover Images #1
description: 6 designs in 27 colours for Notion's Light and Dark mode.The cover images in this pack are based on Notion's text, select and background shades. You can use them to you get a consistent look and feel across your Notion workspace. The pack contains the folders; background, select and text.
